description: This source file provides functions to interact with Supabase's authentication API, including user signup, login, token refresh, logout, and user retrieval, using environment variables for configuration.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] _get_supabase_env()
methods.description: Fetches Supabase URL and service key from environment variables.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _default_headers(api_key: str)
methods.description: Generates default headers for Supabase API calls using the provided API key.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_signup(email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Registers a new user with Supabase Auth, returning user/session info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_login(email: str, password: str)
methods.description: Logs in a user and returns session tokens and user info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_refresh(refresh_token: str)
methods.description: Refreshes the authentication session with a refresh token.

methods.name: None supabase_logout(access_token: str)
methods.description: Logs out a user by revoking the access token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] supabase_get_user(access_token: str)
methods.description: Retrieves current user details based on the access token.

ctags.name: supabase_login
ctags.pattern: /^def supabase_login(email: str, password: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: supabase_signup
ctags.pattern: /^def supabase_signup(email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Op/
ctags.signature: (email: str, password: str, name: Optional[str] = None, email_redirect_to: Optional[str] = None)
